line.text:
Planned Work
[3] Service is extended to New Lots Av

Late Night, 11:45 PM Mon to 5 AM Tue, Apr 29 - 30

[3] trains operate to New Lots Av overnight, replacing the [4] in Brooklyn.

Planned Work
[4] No trains between Brooklyn Bridge and New Lots Av

[2] [3] and [N] [Q] trains provide alternate service
Late Night, 11:45 PM Mon to 5 AM Tue, Apr 29 - 30

[4] Service operates between Woodlawn and Brooklyn Bridge, making local stops.
[3] Service is extended to New Lots Av overnight.

Travel Alternatives

For service between Manhattan and Brooklyn, take the [Q].

For Lower Manhattan and Downtown Brooklyn, take the [2] [3] or [N] (see chart below).

For service between Borough Hall and Franklin Av, take the [2] [3] instead.
Take the [3] between Franklin and New Lots Avs.

• Transfer between [4] and [N] [Q] trains at Canal St or 14 St-Union Sq.
• Transfer between [N] [Q] and [3] trains at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

[4] StationNearby [R] StationNearby [2] [3] Station
Brooklyn Bridge    City HallPark Place [A]
Fulton StCortlandt StFulton St [A] [J]
Wall StRector StWall St
Bowling GreenWhitehall St-South Ferry [1]  —
Borough HallCourt St or
Jay St-MetroTech [ad] [A] [F] 		Borough Hall [ad]
Nevins StDeKalb Av [ad] [D] [Q]Nevins St

Note: Late night service at these [R] stations is provided by the [N].

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.

line.name: ACE
line.text:
Planned Work
[E] No trains between W 4 St and World Trade Center

Late Nights, 12:01 AM to 5 AM, Tue to Fri, Apr 30 - May 3

Manhattan-bound [E] trains run via the [F] after 36 St, Queens to 2 Av.

For Spring St, Canal St and World Trade Center-Chambers St, take the [A]* instead.

• Transfer between trains at W 4 St.

*Please review [A] advisories for additional planned work that may affect your trip.




Planned Work
[E] Manhattan-bound trains run via the [F] from Queens to Manhattan

Late Nights, 9:30 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3

No World Trade Center-bound [E] service at Queens Plaza, Court Sq-23 St, Lexington Av/53 St,
5 Av/53 St and 7 Av.

From 9:30 PM to 12 midnight:
• World Trade Center-bound [E] trains run via the [F] from Roosevelt Av to W 4 St.

• [A] [C] trains provide alternate service at stations from 50 St to W 4 St.

From 12:01 AM to 5 AM:
• Manhattan-bound [E] trains run via the [F] after 36 St (Queens) to 2 Av, the last stop.
• Jamaica Center-bound [E] trains originate at 2 Av and run to W 4 St, then resume regular service
to Jamaica Center.

• [A]* trains provide alternate service at stations from 50 St to Chambers St.

Take [E] to W 4 St for [A] [C] [E]

*Please review [A] advisories for additional planned work that may affect your trip.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[A] Trains run every 30 minutes between 207 St and 168 St

Late Nights, 12:01 AM to 5 AM, Tue to Fri, until May 24

Service operates in two sections:
1. Between 207 St and 168 St
2. Between 168 St and Howard Beach/JFK Airport

• Transfer at 168 St to continue your trip.

Departures to 207 St:
168 St181 StDyckman St
12:19 AM12:22 AM12:26 AM
12:4912:5212:56

  4:31  4:34  4:37

Note: At Dyckman St, 190 St, and 181 St, all trains board at the downtown platform.




Planned Work
[A] Ozone Park/Howard Beach-bound trains skip 50 St, 23 St and Spring St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3

For service to 50 and 23 Sts, take the [A] to 42 St or 14 St and transfer to an uptown [A] or [E].
For service to Spring St, take the [A] to Canal St and transfer to an uptown [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to 59 St, 34 St or W 4 St and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Howard Beach-bound [A].

Note: Uptown [E] service to 34 St is also available from 23 St.

  [ad]  This service change affects one or more ADA accessible stations. Please call 511 for help with planning
your trip. If you are deaf or hard of hearing, use your preferred relay service provider or the free 711 relay.  





Planned Work
[A] Manhattan-bound trains skip Shepherd Av, Van Siclen Av and Liberty Av

Late Nights, 11:15 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until May 17

For service to these stations, take the [A] to Broadway Junction and transfer to an
Ozone Park/Howard Beach-bound [A].

For service from these stations, take the [A] to Euclid Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [A].




Sandy Reroute  Posted: 04/30/2013 12:39AM

Until further notice:

[A] No trains between Howard Beach-JFK/Broad Channel and the Rockaways due to damage sustained during hurricane Sandy.

Free shuttle buses operate nonstop between Howard Beach [A] and Mott Av [H] Stations.

[H] Free shuttle trains operate between Mott Av and Beach 90 St, days and evenings.

Q22  buses provide local service in the Rockaways.

Find out more at:  http://www.mta.info/nyct/service/RebuildingRockawaysAfterHurricanSandy.htm

line.name: BDFM
line.text:
Planned Work
[F] Jamaica-bound trains skip 14 St and 23 St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3 • Tue to Fri, May 7 - 10

For service to these stations, take the [F] to 34 St-Herald Sq and transfer
to a downtown [E]* or [F].

For service from these stations, take the [E]* or [F] to W 4 St and transfer
to a Jamaica-bound [F].

*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.




Planned Work
[D] [N] Manhattan-bound trains run express from 36 St to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3

For service to 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [D] or [N] to
Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N].

For service from these stations, take a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N] to 36 St and
transfer to a Manhattan-bound [D] or [N].

line.name: G
line.text:
Planned Work
[G] No trains between Hoyt-Schermerhorn and Church Av
<> Service operates in two sections:

1. Between Court Sq and Bedford-Nostrand Avs
2. Between Bedford-Nostrand Avs and Hoyt-Schermerhorn
Late Nights, 11 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, until Jun 28* (except 11 PM Mon to 5 AM Tue, May 27 - 28)

No [G] service at Bergen, Carroll Sts, Smith-9 Sts, 4 Av-9 St, 7 Av, 15 St-Prospect Park,
Fort Hamilton Pkwy and Church Av. Take the [F] instead.

• Transfer between [G] trains at Bedford-Nostrand Avs.
• Transfer between [A] and [G] trains at Hoyt-Schermerhorn.
• Transfer between [A] and [F] trains at Jay St-MetroTech.

*Subject to exceptions for holiday and work schedule changes

line.name: NQR
line.text:
Planned Work
[R] No shuttle train between 59 St and 36 St

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3

Shuttle service operates between 95 St and 59 St.

• Take the [N] instead.

Note: At 59 St, Bay Ridge Av, 77 St and 86 St, all [R] trains board at the Manhattan-bound platform.




Planned Work
[Q] Trains run every 30 minutes between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Stillwell Av

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3

Service operates in two sections:
1. Between 57 St-7 Av and Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr ([D] [N] platform)
2. Between Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and Stillwell Av

• Transfer at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to continue your trip.

Departures to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr:

Planned Work
[D] [N] Manhattan-bound trains run express from 36 St to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr

Late Nights, 11:45 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 29 - May 3

For service to 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [D] or [N] to
Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N].

For service from these stations, take a Coney Island-bound [D] or [N] to 36 St and
transfer to a Manhattan-bound [D] or [N].

line.name: B1 - B83
line.text:
Planned Detour
B44 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Nostrand Av
at Avenue H.

Northbound: Buses will make stops along
Flatbush Av at corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
B25 bus stop closure due to Brooklyn Bridge construction

Until further notice

Buses will not stop on Old Fulton St at Prospect St.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board on
Henry St at Cranberry St or Old Fulton St at Hicks St.

line.name: BX1 - BX55
line.text:
Planned Detour
Bx41 buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Northbound/Southbound: Buses will run with delays due
to paving from Webster Av between E 203 St to E 165 St.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx9, Bx12/Bx12SBS, Bx17 and Bx22 buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Northbound/Southbound Bx9, Bx17 and Bx22: Buses
will run will delays from E Fordham Rd between Southern
Blvd and 3 Av.

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will run will delays from
E Fordham Rd between Southern Blvd and 3 Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Bx12/Bx12SBS buses running with delays due to paving

Weeknights, 7 PM to 5 AM, Mon to Fri, Apr 8 - May 3

Eastbound/Westbound: Buses will run with delays
from E Fordham Rd between the Grand Concourse
and University Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: M1 - M116
line.text:
Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013 12:54AM

Following an earlier incident, M9 & M22 bus service has resumed with residual delays.

Service Change  Posted: 04/30/2013 12:41AM

M2, M7 and M116 buses are detoured due to paving on 7 Av between 114 St and 123 St.

Detour is as follows:

M2 Northbound: Via 110 St, right on 8 Av, right on 125 St, left on 7 Av and then regular route.

M7 Northbound: Via 116 St, right on 7 Av, left on 110 St, left on Lenox Av and then regular route.

M7 Southbound: Via Lenox Av, right on 125 St, left on 7 Av, right on 116 St and then regular route.

M116 Eastbound: Via 116 St, right on 7 Av, left on 110 St, left on Lenox Av, right on 116 St and then regular route.

M116 Westbound: Via 116 St, Lenox Av, right on 110 St, right on 8 Av, left on 116 St and the regular route.

Allow additional travel time.



Planned Detour
M31 bus stop change

Until further notice

Buses are bypassing the York Av at 61 St stop.

Westbound: Customers are advised to board
on 62 St at York Av.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M22 buses detoured due to the Chambers Street Reconstruction Project Phase II

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from Chambers St between
North End Av and Broadway.

Eastbound: Buses will make stops along Warren St
between North End Av and West St.

On Warren St between Broadway and Church St at
corresponding locations.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
M15 temporary bus stop change

Until further notice

Bus stops along South St at Broad and Whitehall Sts are
temporarily closed.

Northbound: For the Broad St and Whitehall St stops,
customers are advised to board at the South Ferry Terminal.

For the Water St at Broad St bus stop, customers are advised
to board at Old Slip.

• Please allow additional travel time.

line.name: Q1 - Q113
line.text:
Planned Detour
Q19 buses detoured due to construction

Until further notice

Buses are being detoured from 126 St at Northern Blvd.

No stops will be missed.

• Please allow additional travel time.




Planned Detour
Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch to be limited stop only

Beginning, Sunday, Apr 28

All Q10 Lefferts Blvd Branch local buses will change to
limited stop to provide faster, more consistent service.
The Q10 limited will give exclusive service to the Lefferts
Blvd Branch south of Rockaway Blvd in South Ozone Pk.

The hours of service for the Q10 Limited will be expanded
5:30 am to 11:30 pm on weekdays
6:15 am to 11:30 pm on Saturdays and Sundays

Q10 limited bus stop added in both directions
• Lefferts Blvd and 150 Av

Q10 local only bus stops on the Lefferts Blvd
Branch to be discontinued:
• Lefferts Blvd at Sutter Av, 133 Av and 149 Av

Q10 local service will continue to operate via the
130 St branch. Service on the 130 St branch will
remain unchanged.

line.name: Wassaic
line.text: Buses replace Wassaic Branch train service April 7 through June 2 between 9 AM and 5 PM on weekdays, and between 8 AM and 3 PM on Sundays to accommodate a rock slope remediation project. The bus schedule is included in the April 7 Harlem Line timetables. See http://bit.ly/9rsE8k for schedule. Customers seeking intermediate travel between Wassaic and Southeast must request the stop to the bus driver.  *Note:  Buses will only stop at intermediate stations when requested*
